name: CatDog: The Quest for the Golden Hydrant
name_original: CatDog: The Quest for the Golden Hydrant
description:
CatDog: The Quest for the Golden Hydrant is an arcade game developed by KnowWare. It came out on 01-11-1999. It was published by Hasbro Interactive. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
CatDog: The Quest for the Golden Hydrant is available on PC.
